DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine asynchronous online model teledermatology achieve similar clinical outcome compare conventional in-office care management psoriasis . The investigator also aim determine effect online care model patient quality life well patient physician satisfaction . The investigator ' hypothesis include follow : 1 . Compared in-person visit , online care model result similar clinical improvement psoriasis disease severity . 2 . Compared in-person visit , online care model result similar improvement quality life . 3 . Providers subject online group achieve similar level overall satisfaction in-person group .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Clinical Outcomes Online Teledermatology Model Management Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old time consent , may men woman . Requiring treatment psoriasis medicallyindicated reason . Capable give informed consent . Able skin image family member . NonEnglish speaking individual . Individuals lack access digital camera computer internet connection .
